headline: WTW launches Rewards AI, providing compensation intelligence with generative AI
summary: NEW YORK, Feb. 02, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- WTW (NASDAQ: WTW), a leading global advisory, broking and solutions company, today announced the launch of Rewards AI, a groundbreaking Generative AI-enabled software designed to transform how HR and compensation professionals access, analyze and act on rewards data. Built on WTW's trusted proprietary data, Rewards AI delivers clarity, confidence, and efficiency in compensation decision-making. With accelerating technological advancements and ever-incr
